subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0040_01C9BAC6.4DAAA610
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I would try it both ways -solo and with another person. However I would lim=
it it to just me and one other trustworthy person.


"How would you go abou=
t determining/verified whether it's a ghost (someone stuck in between life =
and the other side), a spirit (someone that's crossed over and came back to=
 say high) and some other type of entity?"

Only after establishing that I =
am indeed communicating with a spirit, and that spirit has given me trustwo=
rthy info consistently, at that point I would simply ask what it's nature i=
s.

April

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: lori bogren 
  To: evp-i=
tc@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, April 11, 2009 2:48 PM
  Subject: [EV=
P-ITC] Oujia Board Testing





  April~
   
  Are you planning on doing th=
is solo or working with a team?
   
  How would you go about determining/ve=
rified whether it's a ghost (someone stuck in between life and the other si=
de), a spirit (someone that's crossed over and came back to say high) and s=
ome other type of entity?
   
  ~Lori




  "My life is boring, my fantasie=
s are a theme park." 
  --Anne Rice  Responding to an interviewer who just =
did not get it. 



    




----------------------------------------------=
--------------------------------
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  From: apri=
l@...
  Date: Fri, 10 Apr 2009 22:37:13 -0600
  Su=
bject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.





 =
 Well, if my husband would let me actually experiment with one, that would =
be the first step LOL!

  But what I would try and do is get some kind of v=
erifiable information from the "entity" that I contact with the board to pr=
ove that it is communication from an actual, intelligent being and not just=
 my own motor responses making he planchette move. It would have to be info=
rmation that I have no knowledge of.

  If I could do that, and consistentl=
y, then I would be comfortable saying that I am actually talking to a spiri=
t.

  The reason I have my doubts is that you have to be touching the planc=
hette to get it to move. If it were an actual spirit, I would think that sh=
ouldn't be necessary. We all know ghosts can a do move objects.

  But this=
 brings up another mystery - if the Ouija board is actual spirit communicat=
ion, maybe there is a difference between the entities you can contact with =
it and your common ghost.

  April

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    F=
rom: lori bogren 
    To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, April =
10, 2009 9:50 PM
    Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual gho=
st hunter stuff.


    April~
     
    Hm, finally I'm intrigued again.
  =
   
    How do you about the process?
     
    ~Lori




    "My life is b=
oring, my fantasies are a theme park." 
    --Anne Rice  Responding to an i=
nterviewer who just did not get it. 



      




------------------------=
----------------------------------------------------
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com
    From: april@...
    Date: Fri, 10 Ap=
r 2009 18:36:30 -0600
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usua=
l ghost hunter stuff.


    .


    When it comes to the Ouija, I just want=
 to study it to find out if it is really spirit communication, or just kine=
tic energy or your subconscious mind moving the planchette.

    I agree th=
at we all have the ability for extra sensory perception, just some are bett=
er at it than others. Like running, for instance. We all can run, but some =
are naturally better at it. Still, with practice we can get better.

    Bu=
t that is not my aim with the Ouija.


      ----- Original Message ----- 
=
      From: lori bogren 
      To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Fri=
day, April 10, 2009 6:11 PM
      Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to =
the usual ghost hunter stuff.


      April~
       
      You forgot yawn =
from boredom, that's what I do.
       
      Use it, don't use it.  I don'=
t care.  But why bother.  When people ask me I usually suggest that if they=
 want to communicate with ... whatever why not develop the ability yourself=
.  - ya, I'm one of those who believe anyone can.
       
      There's alw=
ays the question in the back of your mind whether your partner's moving it.=
  The intentions of "what" you are talking to.  Not to mention it's too slo=
w and limited.
       
      Besides if you take the time to develop the ab=
ility you can get more texture in the information.  Asking the board "where=
 you married?" may get you a "yes" but a psychic might get the sense of a r=
eligious or civil ceremonhy, the garment(s) worn, other's in the party, or =
whether that Being approved/disapproved of their spouse (ie was it a reluct=
ant union).
       
      ~Lori
